requirement.topic: XmlBlaster sends the subscription id in the qos arguments of an update
requirement.description: Sometimes when a client receives an update message, she wants to know which of its subscriptions caused this update. You may retrieve the subscription id in the qos argument of the update: <subscriptionId>. This is is the same which she got as return value of the former subscribe() invocation.
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
